content: TOKYO/SAN FRANCISCO Seagate Technology PLC   a member of the group taking over Toshiba Corp's  chip unit  pledged not to buy any stake in the unit for 10 years as part of the $18 billion deal  showed a document from group leader Bain Capital LP reviewed by Reuters.

content: TOKYO/SAN FRANCISCO  Oct 26 Seagate Technology PLC  a member of the group taking over Toshiba Corp's chip unit  pledged not to buy any stake in the unit for 10 years as part of the $18 billion deal  showed a document from group leader Bain Capital LP reviewed by Reuters.

title: Seagate pledges not to buy stake in Toshiba chip unit for 10 years -Bain document

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  October 02 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Seagate Technology Plc's (Seagate) ratings at 'BBB-' following the company's announcement it will participate in the consortium buying Toshiba's memory chip business. The Rating Outlook is Negative. Fitch's actions affect $6 billion of total debt  including the undrawn $700 million senior secured revolving credit facility (RCF). content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  September 27 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the ratings for Seagate Technology Plc (Seagate)  including the Long-Term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB-'. The Rating Outlook remains Negative. Fitch's actions affect $6 billion of total debt  including the undrawn $700 million senior secured revolving credit facility (RCF). A full list of ratings follows at the end of this release. KEY RATING DRIVERS --Long-Term Growth Head
